Html:
For the time being I am adding a dependency on NAnt.Core.dll to take advantage of the powerful file filtering/selection classes. This may remain or be removed depending on tech needs and community response. 

The library and accompanying license has been added to the repo.
If you're going to keep the NAnt dependency, I'd recommend supplying a Client Profile compatible version. This project doesn't use the Mail stuff anyway, and it might save some folks some headaches.
ill roll that into my next update since this may linger a while at least
